title: Matrix
content:
Does anyone recognize this typeface? Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131225221841/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_127.png) | 3.58 KB |
author: Mario

comments.content:
It's not identical, but [Elektra](http://web.archive.org/web/20131225221841/http:/www.dafont.com/elektra-sh.font?nb_ppp=50&text=SCHWERPUNKT) is a free font in this style.

- Mike Yanega

You could make this using [FontStruct.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131225221841/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/)

- Lex
